events.message: I received the wrong size for my recent order and would like to request a refund immediately.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request concerning a wrong item size.
The case has been assigned to Sarah from the refund department to handle the request effectively.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I understand you want a refund for the wrong size item, and I'm here to help.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number, so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, I have attached pictures of the item showing the incorrect size label along with the order confirmation number.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer, thank you for resolving this issue efficiently.
The refund request has been successfully processed and the case is now resolved to the customer's satisfaction.
We are following up to confirm that the refund was received and to ensure everything is satisfactory with your resolution.
The support case has been formally closed after confirmation that the refund was received and the customer is satisfied.
